storyInfo: Shu and Wang reach a deal. Ji and Wang finally take away the Hundred Scenic Portraits of Great Yan, and peace returns to Dahuang. On a path in the fields, the Old Tianshi blocks Ji's way. She wishes to pose one final question to him.

attributes.content: Who ever thought it'd snow like this?
The field's ridges have been covered with a thick layer of despair-inducing white. The bits of yellow dotting it are the heads of grain that were laboriously planted only a month prior.
How many plants would still be alive after ten days? One dares not think.
A musbeast stumbles around, barging into the silent field of wheat.

Even the sparse crops in front of it are an unexpected joy. It sniffs around carefully, calculating how much it needs to tide it over and how much would be left to take back to the cave to feed its kin.
Until a thick metal hoe crashes down on its spine.
Three more heads of wheat are gone.

The angry farmer snatches the beast that has been ruining the crops, so angry that he wants to skin it to make a meal. However, the carcass is so emaciated that it hardly weighs more than a few taels.
With a long sigh, the farmer digs a hole in the ground and buries the beast's body.
Poor thing.
Hardship strikes at will. Such occurrences are common.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: If the wheat dies in this freeze, how many people will perish next year?
A great many.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: But there will also be many who come to their aid, and a lot of them will survive.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Life itself will not cease.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: The firmament is as a veil.
The ethereal satin-silk seems to be infinitely weighty, firmly separating the two combatants and pressing towards them.
Nian, let's wrap it up.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: It took a considerable amount of effort to build this heart for you. It would be a terrible shame to see it torn apart in this conflict.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: You aren't in a position to be making small talk yourself. I nearly took your head off with that firecracker blast just now.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Where'd all that destructive might of yours go? Why don't you make a massive pair of scissors and cut his little fabrications to bits?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: You put some effort into it too! He's about to turn your painting into papercraft!
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Oh, it's my fault now?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Cut me some slack here, he just turned that big ol' firecracker I built into a pile of threads. Has he always been able to do stuff like that?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Didn't think he'd ever have the will to work on his powers over the years.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: But the question is, why does he seem to have such a good grasp of what our powers are...?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Hold on, is it really just one guy we're up against?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Time's almost up...
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: I truly would like to stick around to chat more, as rare as our reunions are. However, the unfortunate reality is that I am short on time, and must bid you farewell.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: I really wish I didn't have to use this. The next time we meet, I will have to make amends.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: If we meet again, that is...
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: To think you'd strike down your own sister. What a disgrace.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Shu?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I didn't think you'd just go and disappear altogether, but... Are you alright?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I sincerely hope you weren't just trying to scare us on purpose...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Think of it as a much-needed rest. Sorry for worrying you.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: And here I was wanting to see my little brother again, lo and behold the scene I come back to. Does he really not see this place as home anymore?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: ...My dear sister.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: I know that look. That's the look on your face whenever you've done something wrong.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: How long has it been?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: ...Sixty-seven years.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Then, you'll have to stay for dinner. If you have anything to say, you can say it at the table.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: I'm sorry, my dear sister. I can't listen to you this time.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: So, you're taking orders from someone else now, huh...?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: The one who's been behind the curtain this whole time. How much longer does he plan to stay hidden?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Whatever it is, wouldn't it be better to tell me face-to-face?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: A man slowly walks forth from the distance, sauntering past the threshold of time immemorial. It is as if he has been there since the very beginning.
Time and space halt with the sound of his footsteps.
You finally decide to show yourself.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: There's a whole crowd... What a lively gathering.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: You all... are still inclined to such excitement?
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Wait, didn't he go insane?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: The atmosphere of our little reunion isn't quite what I expected...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: What happens in the movies when a relative on the most-wanted list suddenly shows up at your doorstep?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Is he actually the real deal, or just a shadow?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Any shenanigans the weiqi failure tried to pull wouldn't surprise me at this point. It'd be a big deal if he pulled another Sui-Xiang out of his ass though...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: So, what's the plan, Shu? Are we fighting?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Shangshu, Yumen, and now here... Don't you think you've gone too far?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Small sacrifices for the greater good, each unto their own. Nothing more, nothing less.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Look at all the devastated fields out there, and all the suffering people... I can't forgive you for talking like that.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Upon careful consideration, there still remain two lines of inquiry regarding who owes this debt.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Then, you stay here so we can tally it up.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: This account has been accumulating debt for over a thousand years.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: You haven't been here in a long time.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: There are things I must do... There is a battlefield to the north. When the troops assemble, I must stand on the front lines.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: 'Bleached bones exposed in the wilds, where fowls sing not for a thousand li.'
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: After a thousand years of war, in the end, it is still the commoners in the fields who suffer.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: You care about them a great deal.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: The people you take so lightly are actually our teachers, in the truest sense. We take after their form, find things that interest us, and only then do we find our place in the world.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: We have nothing in common with them. Not a single thing.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: What is so different about us?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Feranmuts may have lives spanning tens of thousands of years, while mayflies die as quickly as they live. But in the end, we are all lives born under Heaven. Everything that has a beginning must also have an end.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Warfare and slaughter. Why exactly did you choose this path? What value do you see in it?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Law and order.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: I recently learned a game, weiqi. The rules are simple, but the underlying principles are quite similar to the art of war.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: It has demonstrated to me a singular wisdom: as chaotic and disorderly as things may appear, master the rules, and the final outcome will fall into place.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: The final outcome that we've all been so keenly focused on.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: This dead silence... This is the outcome that you see.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Not just for us, but for all things living in these lands.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: How ironic. If death is the effect, then does that not make life itself the cause?
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Do you never get tired of standing watch here?
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Everything in existence is worthy of being cherished, just as it is now.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: All things have their time. People, beasts, mountains, water, grass, trees. They are all alike in this regard. That is the Dao the people speak of.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: The grass becomes lush and green every spring. We have come, and we have existed. Is that not enough?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: So, you've resigned yourself to this end.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: That's not what you really think.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: I was simply wondering...
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Have we ever lived as our true selves?
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Wait, don't tell me you...?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: I've been contemplating this for a long time... Calculating.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Finally... I have seen another outcome.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Not far away, a green sapling pokes its head out from underneath the snow.
I know you can see it, Shu.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: The haggard man stretches out his hand, his fingertips still covered with rough callouses.
Can you read my palm for me?
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: 'Endless solitude; kalpas blurred, death nigh inexorable.'
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: I'm very much looking forward to that... I shall be waiting.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: ...Were you able to see her again?
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: You know that wouldn't be possible.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: I often find myself thinking of her.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: She said that 'education is the great equalizer' and wished for every person to be able to read and write... All those schools and books are her legacy.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: In that regard, you are quite similar.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: But, these last few years, I've forgotten many things... including her.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: About the books she wrote, and the meaning held by a true name in one lone word...
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: I can clearly recall that she once played a game with me. She wanted to tell me something during that game, but I've already forgotten what it was.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: I thought...
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Yes... Even we cannot escape this influence.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: You have regrets.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: I want to find a remedy...
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: A hundred and eighty-one fragments. Everyone thought... you had lost your mind.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Perhaps...
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: What do you intend to do?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: I wish to return to that husk. I require Its power.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: I will slay It. And then I shall become It.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: And using Its power, I will plot a 'great windfall' for all beings in this realm.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: It'll cost you your life.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: But the rest of you will live. And truly be yourselves...
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Shu, lend me a portion of your power.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: The twelve of us, with each additional portion of strength comes another chance at victory.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: The vast farmland crisscrosses, and this particular visitor places a piece on the weiqi board.
Shu opens her palm, and a handful of seeds fall onto the board.
This must be your answer.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: You reap what you sow.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: If you haven't veered off the path and really are heading towards our end, then these seeds will germinate at the right time and bear the fruit you desire.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: You will have conditions for me as well.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: We can't let you keep creating problems for us.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Hah...
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: And so concludes the discussions concerning my affairs. If there's anything else, you should speak.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: You've really grown up, huh? Ready to fly the nest?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: I'm a thousand years old... my dear sister.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: I can't stop you.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: We had a big argument the last time I left. Could you leave me something to remember you by, this time?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: You've already woven all of Dahuang into that brocade of yours. What else do you want to take from me?
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: If you have a bit of remorse in there, you'd better come back alive.
attributes.name: Shu

attributes.content: Fair enough...
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Dusk, can I ask one last thing from you?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: That painting... Can you give it to me up front?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: How did youâ€“
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I will take good care of it.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: And with that, consider our account settled.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Who said you could go?
You again...
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: The second Sui brother! Ni ya ting de! I knew you were behind this!
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Do you have nothing better to do? Done hiding out in your ruined temple playing your shitty game of weiqi, and now you have to come to my turf to ruin everything?
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Look at the mess you've all made with your little spat here, and all the crops you've destroyed! See if I won't beat your ass right here and now!
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Watch out!
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: The satin-silk ignites upon contact with the incandescent white flames, reduced to smoke and ash in the blink of an eye.
Originium Arts that can reverse decomposition? When did you learn how to...? No, that's not it... This is causality?
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Hah... Let's see how many more seeds you have left to withstand my flames!
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Tianshi... This might not be the best time to launch your attack.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: The Chamber of Heaven's Designs has suffered grave losses. Any more wrong moves, and Great Yan's entire northern defensive line may be imperiled.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: It is more than just the demonic taint that has eyes on Yan's northern border, right?
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Stop trying to scare people! I swear, I'm gonna teach you a lesson if it's the last thing I do!
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Then, do you not care at all about the other long-lived among you?
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: You little...
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Ahh... You feign lunacy to protect your mind from demonic contamination, but you've not forgotten your true purpose at all.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Weigh the pros and the cons. Surely there's no reason we shouldn't be able to come to some accord.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Until we meet again.
attributes.name: Wang

attributes.content: Is it... over...?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Yes, it's all over now.
attributes.name: Ethereal Woman

attributes.content: You were willing to throw away your life for this project. Why?
attributes.name: Ethereal Woman

attributes.content: ...To become renowned for such a grand accomplishment.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: And then what?
attributes.name: Ethereal Woman

attributes.content: I have a dream...
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Cities interconnected for ten thousand li, stretching to the palace of Heaven; no longer would anyone across this great land want for shelter from wind and rain.
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: What is the point of being a Tianshi without any accomplishments to his name...?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: Must you stand head and shoulders above the rest in order to lay the bricks of the city of your dreams?
attributes.name: Ethereal Woman

attributes.content: Are you... one of the Heavenly Xians?
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: I'll trade your life for your dream.
attributes.name: Ethereal Woman

attributes.content: (Shallow breathing)
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: The Skybound White Jade Capital, of Twelve Pagodas and Five Cities... The Xian strokes my head, knots my hair, and grants eternal life...
attributes.name: Assistant Minister Wan

attributes.content: The Skybound White Jade Capital, of Twelve Pagodas and Five Cities.
Alas, could I get mansions of ten thousand chambers, I'd shelter all the needy under Heaven, blessing them with joy.
You're awake?
attributes.name: Passing Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: Where am I...?
attributes.name: Rong Wanqing

attributes.content: Don't worry, the monsters are gone.
attributes.name: Passing Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: You saved me...?
attributes.name: Rong Wanqing

attributes.content: I wouldn't say that.
attributes.name: Passing Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: You were lying unconscious on the ground when I found you, so I went over to try to wake you up.
attributes.name: Passing Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: ...Duoxie.
attributes.name: Rong Wanqing

attributes.content: You're the Old Xiangzhang of Dahuang, but the responsibility does not fall solely on your shoulders.
attributes.name: Passing Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: It might not necessarily be a good deal to exchange your life for the safety and stability of this place.
attributes.name: Passing Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: That's my choice to make... What matters is that Dahuang is safe.
attributes.name: Rong Wanqing

attributes.content: You care a lot about this place.
attributes.name: Passing Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: Of course I care. I've spent most of my life here, and my roots run deep...
attributes.name: Rong Wanqing

attributes.content: Mmhmm.
attributes.name: Passing Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: Take care of yourself. I'm off.
attributes.name: Passing Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: Goodbye, Shu.
attributes.name: Rong Wanqing

attributes.content: You deserve your freedom.
attributes.name: Rong Wanqing

attributes.content: The incubator, the incubator...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The rice plant can still be saved... There's still hope for the experiment...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Here you are...
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: I've found it!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Found what?
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: This is the one rice plant... the one that survived the 'Wanqing' project's experimental plot.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It isn't impossible to grow crops on Originium-contaminated soil. Laoshi's experiments proved itâ€“â€“
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Wait...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: You're...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Judging from your clothes, are you a Shouye Tianshi from the Bureau? I don't think I've seen you before...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Yes... I haven't been here very long.
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: The young man scratches his head in confusion, as if he has forgotten something.
It is as if he has dreamed a long dream, and the emotions from it still vaguely linger in his heart. He just can't remember the people he met or the things he encountered.
After spacing out for a spell, the young man cracks a smile.
I'm an apprentice of the Tianshi Bureau, called He Sheng. I guess I ought to call you Laoshi now too.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Hello, He Sheng...
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: I just discovered a very important crop... one that can grow on soil contaminated by Originium...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: This has been a long-term project. As long as this crop can be widely distributed, we'll be able to reclaim tons of wasteland into usable farmland, and nobody will go hungry ever again...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It might take a while to reach that goal, maybe even a really long time, but at least, there's a glimmer of hope now.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: In that case, are you willing to devote the rest of your time to that goal?
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I wish you luck.
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: Do your best. I won't keep you from your research any longer. Zai gin.
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: Huh? You're leaving already? I was hoping to tell you a bit more about the project, and maybe get a few pointers...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: That's alright. I trust that you'll be able to accomplish your goals.
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: Zai gin.
attributes.name: Kind Woman

attributes.content: Hmm...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: That teacher... Why does it seem like I've seen her somewhere before?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Off to deliver the goods, Laobo?
attributes.name: Astute Merchant

attributes.content: How are food prices this year?
attributes.name: Astute Merchant

attributes.content: Famine year. Each catty of grain is three wen more expensive than last year.
attributes.name: Elderly Farmer

attributes.content: I suppose when everything's accounted for, your coin sack's a bit heavier than it was last year?
attributes.name: Astute Merchant

attributes.content: That's not necessarily a good thing.
attributes.name: Elderly Farmer

attributes.content: Farming's all about putting food on people's tables. Never heard of farming to get rich.
attributes.name: Elderly Farmer

attributes.content: Let me teach you a method to make a little extra money. Just keep it in the back of your mind when you're selling your goods.
attributes.name: Astute Merchant

attributes.content: Sell your highest-quality crops locally at a normal price to increase your reputation; for your average-quality stuff, mark up the price and hire a caravan to ship it far away as a novelty product.
attributes.name: Astute Merchant

attributes.content: What are you going on about? Never anything so silly.
attributes.name: Elderly Farmer

attributes.content: The best crops are for family and friends first. You sell the average-quality stuff, and then use the rest as feed.
attributes.name: Elderly Farmer

attributes.content: You youngsters have way too many sly tricks.
attributes.name: Elderly Farmer

attributes.content: Where're you planning to go?
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Baizao.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: After making that much trouble, you just up and leave without saying anything?
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: It is time to leave. Though, I also don't have Dage's martial skill. If you won't let me go, then naturally, I won't be able to leave.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: So, it depends on you. How unwilling are you to let me leave?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: I just wanted to ask you a question.
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: You said you were gonna make a deal with Yan. Were you planning to help build Dahuang up from the very beginning?
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: I am a merchant, and when doing business, I value mutual profit and reciprocity. If only one side profits, how would I be any different from a robber?
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: If you didn't want to make an enemy out of all Yan, why did you need to do all this?
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Did you two brothers really have to pick a fight with Yan?
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Our sister was killed, after all.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: That said, the people of Yan harbor no animus towards us. Even if Erge sees the world as nothing more than a weiqi board, a weiqi player naturally feels some sentiment towards the pieces and equipment he's used for a long time.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: However, those sitting in the court, lurking in the shadows, must pay the price for what they've done.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: This account... must be settled eventually.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Even if your own life is on the line?
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Using a twelfth to combat the whole was already a fool's errand.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: My life has already been assigned a price upon the ledger.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: You really have lost it...
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: I still remember, a long time ago, you came to visit all of us, one by one, posing a question to each and pointing the way.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: 'What do you see in the lands of Great Yan?'
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: My answer has never changed, and I imagine the same is true for Erge.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Wo pei! Never cared for either of you bastards from the very beginning. There's no talking wisdom with you. And when the time is right, I'm still coming to beat your asses.
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: My brother used to have quite the temper. Whenever he'd lose a game, he'd start throwing cups and bowls around. But weak as he was, there was never any strength behind it.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: This time, he went a bit overboard, so thank you for stepping in.
attributes.name: Ji

attributes.content: Gun kai! Get outta here already!
attributes.name: 'Old Tianshi'

attributes.content: Until we meet again.
attributes.name: Ji
